topic.title: Good Friday - Class online only - 9:35-11
topic.text:
Hi Class.  

Tomorrow will be the last offical class, but it will work very much like an office hour.  It is Good Friday and my kids daycare is closed. So I will be doing class online only.  Bring your questions and we can make plans on how to wrap up the semester with the best grades possible. 

See you tomorrow

Dr. Sounny
